body.name: 2.5K HD Indoor Camera with SD Card, 2.4/5GHz WiFi Camera, Pan/Tilt Pet Camera Motion Detection, Two-Way Audio, Night Vision Home Security Cameras Compatible with Alexa-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 21 mins
features: 【5GHz Wifi Camera】Home camera is equipped with dual-band connectivity, operating seamlessly on both 2.4GHz and 5GHz frequencies. Just plug it in, connect it to a WiFi network, you can finish its setup easily and quickly in minutes.

【2.5K HD Night Vision & 360° Coverage】Indoor camera for home security provides 2.5K super HD resolution. The wide angle enhanced lens boasts a 355° horizontal rotation and a 70° vertical rotation, 360 degree coverage of every corner of the monitoring area without blind spots. Smart pet cameras are ideal for working as baby, elderly, dog or cat cameras, or help you see what puppy are doing when you're away.

【24/7 Real-Time Motion Alert & Smart Siren】Home security camera supports motion detection and push alert to monitor your baby/pet/elder. Your phone will get an alert notification to push in time once motion is detected. Meanwhile, when you turn on the function of auto movement tracking, the home camera will move as the object moves. Sensitivity and frequency can also be customized according to needs.

【Remote Monitoring & Two-Way Audio】Cameras for home security has a built-in microphone and speaker. With the two-way audio, not only can you hear what is happening in the monitored area, but you can also transmit your voice in real-time.Whether you are checking in on your baby, communicating with pets, or remotely managing a space, the two-way audio feature ensures clear and responsive dialogue. Perfect for you to keep an eye on at home while you are at the office or traveling.

【No Monthly Fee & Including 64GB SD Card】 In order for you to have a good experience, first-time users are provided with a free 30-day cloud storage trial service. Indoor security camera supports Micro SD card (up to 128GB) or Cloud storage. Our security camera is equipped with a 64GB SD card. This means that you can record high-quality video clips for a long time without worrying about paying additional monthly fees.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: View clear live 2.5k HD vedio with a 360° panoramic view of every corner of your home.

Night Vision & Two-way Audio With built-in infrared LED and 2.5K night vision range, you can capture your baby's every move at night. You can also talk to your baby through the indoor camera. Menggood Home Security Cameras pays attention to your family 24 hours a day in an intelligent way! Motion/Sound Detection Menggood indoor security camera would record 6-second videos automatically when detecting motion or sounds. Alert notifications will be quickly pushed to your mobile phone. Security camera indoor perfect for baby monitor,elderly and pet care. Included 64G SD Card，No Monthly Fee Cloud storage and SD card storage are optional. We provide a 64GB SD card. You can enjoy our 5GHz indoor security camera without paying additional fees.

Support 2.4/5G Wifi Connection It is no longer limited to 2.4G wifi connection, and it can also connect to 5G wifi, so that you will no longer be troubled by blocked networks. Share with Multiple Users The indoor camera enables multiple users to view the camera and be able to see home monitoring information at the same time. As long as other people have the same "YI loT" app as you, you can share the QR code and device with them to view together. Works with Alexa This indoor camera is suitable for Alexa. You can ask Alexa to show your front door, baby room, or anywhere else you have you via the IP camera. Menggood baby camera makes your home more relaxing.

Smart Motion/Sound Detection & Real Time Alerts Menggood Indoor Wi-Fi security IP camera supports that customized the alert frequency, sensitivity level and schedule the alert time via APP. It will reduce the false alarms with AI human detection and adjustable sensitivity. This home security camera with 355° horizontal & 70°wide angle lens form 360°complete coverage, protecting your baby, pet, elderly and nanny all day long. You can easily control it through YI loT App.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great peace of mind!
reviews.reviewText: These cameras are a great price, easy to set up (less than 2 minutes when you've had them before) and work really well. We use them when we go on vacation for a few days, to check on our house and our cats. I set up 4, they install easily, set up quickly and do a great job giving us peace of mind. I did have 3 of these before, for our trip last September, and our modem died in April so they were cut off from the Wifi. And no matter what I did when I got the new modem up and working, I could not reset these to get to connect again. So, I had to buy new ones. For the price, I really didn't mind, but it was annoying that I spent three days trying to connect the old ones and they just wouldn't do it. I'm hoping this won't happen again in similar situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 of these and love them. The picture is clear and I love that they can rotate up and down and side to side. The app is easy to use and I really like how I can watch all three cameras at the same time. Highly recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far so good
reviews.reviewText: this camera works well so far...happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture was ok but instructions SUCK. It came with an SD but there’s no mention of how to install it and you’re constantly badgered to buy a subscription for a cloud service. Apparently there’s a way to record video but the print in the instructions is so small you can’t read it and instructions are incomplete. They don’t tell you how to install the SD card or operate the record function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best room camera
reviews.reviewText: I have had IP cams before, and needed one. I chose this one because it was similar to my others. But the quality of the pictures is not very good. I rely on both day and night views. I have a thermometer in one room where I can point the camera to see how to adjust the room temp. My other camera got a nice clear picture day and night. This camera gives me such a fuzzy and blurred image, I can barely read the numbers on the thermometer. When scrolling around the room, the camera has jerky movements. The worst thing is when you open the app, the page is almost entirely one big ad every time, and you have to get out of that before you can view an image! I would not choose this camera next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great for our kids play room. Set up was easy as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Budget friendly camera. Not for recording unless you subscribe to cloud service.
reviews.reviewText: This seemed like a great find, because it was difficult to find a 5Ghz compatible wifi camera for under $50. It’s easy to set up and easy to use. Installing the SD card took a few tries, but functions properly after successfully reformatting the SD card. I don’t love the black & white view when it’s dark, but it’s not a deal breaker. It’s a decent camera with a lot of good features, like motion detection, motion following, alerts, and recording. It also has a mounting kit to hang it and a usb plug, so usb extension cables can be used for a clean look. We will purchase more of these for other rooms!**UPDATE: I knocked off a star. The app has changed to disable video viewing (an ad for their cloud service covers the entire viewing area), and there seems to be some kind of malfunction with the SD card. At this point I cannot successfully reformat the SD card, view any prior videos, or even turn the camera off. The app keeps insisting I purchase their cloud service, and I guess they’ll go as far as disabling features that were originally included with purchasing the camera. This is a big turn off for me. I had planned to buy more cameras for other areas of the house, but now I’ll be going with something else. It’s just obnoxious.***Update 2! Knocked off two more stars. I avoided updating the app, but then got a new phone. Now, not only are some originally included features disabled (like video playback with the SD card), but I get an ad EVERY time I look at the camera. This is beyond obnoxious, and I can’t wait to replace this camera. My advice - keep looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good baby monitor
reviews.reviewText: I have it set up in my daughter's playroom and I stream the video on my Alexa screen which is very convenient. The quality of video is good and clear, it also included an SD card for storage. I have been able to use it with 5ghz wifi where many others wouldn't work! Overall good camera at an affordable price.
